Bob Graham Round – GPX Files

This page provides downloadable GPX files for each leg of the Bob Graham Round. Files are available in two versions:

  • Archive: Styled, full-featured GPX (e.g. with colours and metadata for use in GPX editors)
  • Device-Compatible: Simplified GPX for use with Garmin and Strava

Downloads

  • Leg 1 (archive) | Leg 1 (device)
  • Leg 2 (archive) | Leg 2 (device)
  • Leg 3 (archive) | Leg 3 (device)
  • Leg 4 (archive) | Leg 4 (device)
  • Leg 5 (archive) | Leg 5 (device)
  • Merged Full Route (archive) | Merged Full Route (device)
